resources.string:
I am Deepika. I am from Kanya Kumari.
Currently I am pursuing my BE in Karpagam College Of Engineering at Coimbatore.
I have completed my summer intern in ZOHO.
Now I have joined here as a project trainee.
My hobbies are drawing and singing.
During free hours I spend my time mostly in pencil arts.
My strengths are hardworking and selfmotivating.
I am happy.
